definition: The parcel must be amalgamated with one or more parcels created by the survey when the survey is deposited
The parcel is being created by the survey

The parcel has been subject to natural erosion and/or accretion and the definition of the parcel has been/should be updated. Relevant where the parcel affected by the accretion/erosion is not extinguished by the survey
The parcel is referenced by the survey
The parcel is being replaced by one or more parcels created by the survey

The parcel is introduced on the survey but has not actually been ‘created’. This will generally only apply to parcels such as Future Development Units (FDU) on a Proposed Unit Development plan (PUD). The parcel will be created in a subsequent plan, e.g., Stage 1 of the Unit Development
The parcel is referenced by the survey
